reqs:
Pre-reqs: MINE 331.
The lab section will be re-scheduled at the beginning of the term.
Students from outside the department wanting to take any of the following courses (MINE 292, MINE 331, MINE 333, MINE 590J, MINE 541, MINE 462/522, MINE 438/590P, MINE 434/ 522, MINE 224) are required to complete the following safety requirements before registering in the course http://mining.ubc.ca/safety/safety-requirements/. You will be waitlisted until you have met the requirements.
description: Process alternatives and mineralogical considerations; physical and chemical recovery technologies; environmental protection; flowsheet studies.
